name: G1337 RISKY
description:
G1337 RISKY is a top down, score based shooter-em/mine-em up (sorry, no trading here!!) inspired by the popular space game Elite.

Our entry for GBJAM 5.

-----------------------------------------------

Controls

-----------------------------------------------

Direction = 'A - D'

Thrust = 'O' (Double Tap for Boost)

Break = 'S'

Fire = 'P'

Radar Ping = 'E'

-----------------------------------------------

By Laser Dog Games

@laserdoggames

http://www.laserdog.co.uk

(@roballison & @si_renshaw)

Made in 3 days using Corona SDK

Music made using Gameboy with LSDJ (ambient mix uses Logic Pro X and effects).
